task.title: Provide volume control
task.shortdesc: You can set up a user interface control for sound volume.

step.cmd: Wait for the MediaPlayer instance to be in a valid state for this command, which is any except RELEASED or ERROR.
Call setVolume on the MediaPlayer instance to set the audio volume.

info.p: The value for the volume represents the requested volume expressed as a proportion of the maximum volume, where 0 is silent and 100 is the maximum volume.
